text.text: THE ORGANIXING COMMITTEE OF THE FIRSTEAST ASIAN GAMES CONSIST OF 19DEPARTMENTS.
第一届东亚运动会组委会下设19个部委室。
Mr.Lee:Ms Wang has told me that she is woring parttime for the office of the organizing Committee?
李先生:王小姐告诉我她在组委会办公室兼职?
Ms Zhang:Yes,and me too,but we're mot in the samedepartment.
张小姐:对，我也在那儿兼职，不过我们不在一个部门。
李先生:你们一共有多少部门?
Ms Zhang:TheOrganixing Committed of theFirst East Asian Gamescomsists of 19 departments.
张小姐:第一届东亚运动会组委会下设19个部委室。
